summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Corliss Avenue from North Fortieth Street to North Forty-first Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon, with all necessary surface drainage, in accordance with Resolution No. 1807 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
